CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Manager
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Module
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​IChangeWatcher
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Manager

Multithreading: Thread Safety Notes

Externally, this class is thread safe.  All locking is handled internally so you may access it from multiple threads.  Internally all access is handled by accessLock.

SearchIndex.nd

A file used to store the state of the search index.

[String: Prefix]
[NumberSet: Prefix Topic IDs]
...
[String: null]

The file stores each prefix as a string followed by a NumberSet of its associated topic IDs.  The String-NumberSet pairs continue in no particular order until it reaches a null ID.

PrefixTopicIDs
public IDObjects.NumberSet PrefixTopicIDs (
string prefix
)

Returns a IDObjects.NumberSet of all the topic IDs that are associated with the passed prefix.  If there are none, it will return null.  Do not change the NumberSet.

UsedPrefixes
public List<string> UsedPrefixes ()

Returns a list of all prefixes used in the index.

GetKeywordEntries
public List<KeywordEntry> GetKeywordEntries (
string prefix,
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Returns a list of all the KeywordEntries for a prefix, complete with all their TopicEntries.  If there are none it will return null.  The returned list will not be in any particular order, it is up to the calling code to sort them as desired.

IncludeInIndex
protected bool IncludeInIndex (
Topic topic
)

Whether the passed Topic should be included in the search index.

LoadBinaryFile
public static bool LoadBinaryFile (
Path filename,
out StringTable<IDObjects.NumberSet> prefixTopicIDs
)

Loads the information in SearchIndex.nd and returns whether it was successful.  If not all the out parameters will still return objects, they will just be empty.

Saves the passed information in SearchIndex.nd.

SearchIndex.IChangeWatcher Functions
AddChangeWatcher
public void AddChangeWatcher (
IChangeWatcher watcher
)

Adds an object to be notified about changes to the index.  This can be called both before and after Start().

AddPriorityChangeWatcher
public void AddPriorityChangeWatcher (
IChangeWatcher watcher
)

Adds an object to be notified about changes to the index.  Ones added with this function will receive change notifications before ones that aren't.  This can be called both before and after Start().

RemoveChangeWatcher
public void RemoveChangeWatcher (
IChangeWatcher watcher
)

Removes a watcher so that they're no longer notified of changes to the index.  It doesn't matter which function you used to add it with.  This can be called both before and after Start().
